item.title: CloudFlare Pages: Deploy Awesome Static Sites, Quickly.
item.description: Cloudflare Pages. Another awesome way to deploy a site. I was pleasantly surprised to see how user-friendly Cloudflare Pages is. As someone doing coding and development as a new hobby, it’s refreshing to use intuitive tools and an uncluttered interface. The steps I followed to deploy were: Create a repository on github.com. Create the Hugo site locally Initialize a git repository in the local Hugo site work directory, and commit it to the remote repository, main branch.
